resources.string:
Professional in international relations and international trade. 

Specialized in commercial and administrative support of export processes and international development strategies of companies, mainly in the technology sector. 

I like to solve problems and work in teams. My international experience is very useful to work with international teams in different languages. 

I study Java and Kotlin for native development for Android, but I also intend to improve my knowledge in Javascript (React Native), Dart (Flutter) and Swift/Objective-C to develop also for IOS
